Title: TUC chief calls on ministers to show 'whose side' they are on
Description: Paul Nowak will tell his annual conference the government must do more for working class communities.

Title: Ex-sergeant major admits sexually assaulting soldier who took her own life
Description: Michael Webber pleaded guilty to sexual assault against teenage soldier Jaysley Beck, who was left traumatised by the incident.

Title: With the Pixel 10 Pro XL, Google finally made a faultless flagship
Description: It may not have groundbreaking upgrades, but the Pixel 10 Pro XL is an absolute delight to use.

Title: Apple Watch SE 3 and More Seemingly Confirmed by Last-Minute Leak
Description:
A private account on X with a proven track record today shared alleged details about upcoming Apple Watch and iPad Pro models.
Here are the alleged devices that the account mentioned:Apple Watch Series 11 with a chip based on the same architectur…

Title: Tomorrow We Could See the iPhone 17 Debut With a Long-Overdue Update
Description: Commentary: The iPhone 17 may finally add a long-awaited feature you'll use every day (and no, it's not the cameras, design or battery).

Title: All iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro Battery Capacities Allegedly Leaked
Description:
Just ahead of Apple unveiling the iPhone 17 series on Tuesday, it appears that battery capacities for the devices have surfaced in a Chinese regulatory database.
The table below lists the alleged battery capacities for each model, which were shared in a …

Title: Attempted Trump assassination trial begins. And, South Korea to fly 300 workers home
Description:
Jury selection begins today in the trial of the man charged with attempting to assassinate Trump last year.
And, South Korea plans to bring home more than 300 workers who were detained by ICE agents.

Title: Alone in a foreign country, a young woman is saved by two strangers
Description:
In 1980, Elaine Batchelor was attacked on a night train while backpacking alone in Europe.
Two strangers stepped in and stayed by her side for the rest of the 12-hour ride.

Title: Blackpink's Rosé just notched an unprecedented win for K-pop at the VMAs
Description:
Rosé's hit song with Bruno Mars, "APT," won the "Song of the Year" award at the 2025 VMAs.
It's the first K-pop song to have won the VMAs category.

Title: I'm on a hunger strike outside DeepMind's office in London. Here's what I fear most about AI.
Description: Trazzi said he wants DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis and other AI leaders to stop releasing new models until stricter safety protocols can be met.

Title: I worried homeschooling would make my kids antisocial and friendless. I was wrong.
Description:
I worried homeschooling would prevent my kids from having a healthy social life.
They have plenty of friends, and I'm so glad I was proven wrong.

Title: From chemtrails to Cracker Barrel, Americans are creating wild conspiracy theories about companies
Description: From American Eagle to Cracker Barrel, Americans are now creating wild conspiracy theories about minor company decisions.

Title: Eye black, meditation and Bob Marley: Inside J.J. McCarthy's game-day rituals
Description: Justin Jefferson said McCarthy, who makes his NFL debut Monday against the Bears, "has the winning attitude."

Title: Texas’s Gerrymander May Not Be the Worst Threat to Democrats in 2026
Description: Isaac Chotiner interviews Nate Cohn, the New York Times’ chief political analyst, about how redistricting efforts in Texas and California may affect the midterm elections.

Title: Anthony Roth Costanzo Finds His Diva
Description: The countertenor searches for the right look to conjure Maria Callas for his starring role in the new production of “Galas,” Henry Alford writes.

Title: A Round of Gulf?
Description: Shouts & Murmurs by Ian Frazier: Golf in Scotland or the Gulf of Mexico, and how President Trump keeps them straight.

Title: Bella Freud’s Podcast, “Fashion Neurosis,” Offers a Talking Cure
Description: Rebecca Mead profiles a great-granddaughter of Sigmund Freud and a child of the painter Lucian Freud, who has launched a popular podcast, “Fashion Neurosis.”

Title: Nostalgic Cravings at the Minnesota State Fair
Description:
Many of the staffers at Sweet Martha’s Cookie Jar start as teen-agers.
Some of them are committed for life.
Hannah Goldfield reports.

Title: Rivals Rub Shoulders in the World of Competitive Massage
Description: Sarah Larson reports from the World Championship in Massage, in Copenhagen, where therapists compete in categories such as wellness, Thai, facial, and chair massage.

Title: The Abundance Delusion
Description: I mean, what even is a Democrat at this point?
